name: The Time-Loop Robot
description:
The Time-Loop Robot

The experiments have failed.

You are The Time-Loop Robot and must collect all six time crystals to restore time - and the fabric of reality - back to working order!
You'll need to find upgrades, as your 1000mAH battery may not get you far.

Controls

Movement:  WASD / Arrow Keys
Restart time-loop: R
[Another action unlocked later on]:  Hold CTRL whilst moving

Intro text

Distress.txt The experiments have failed. The time crystals are causing untold damages to our reality. We appear to be trapped in a time-loop, but so are you. It seems to affect your mechanics differently to our biology. We need you to collect all six time crystals on your base. This will not be an easy task and your limited battery may cause problems. The time loops are inevitable, and the universe will reset - many times. However, your memory and your upgrades will remain. Collect upgrades and study your environment. When you are able, collect all of six time crystals to break the cycle. Good luck. - The Crew

A game for BuddyJam Spring 2022 by Team26
